description.value:
You unleash a corona of stellar energy in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10], which lasts until the end of your next turn. You can Sustain your Corona for up to 1 minute. If your attunement changes, your Corona's attunement effect changes to match. While graviton-attuned, your Corona has the darkness trait. While photon-attuned, your Corona has the light trait.

Graviton-Attuned Your Corona is darkness that prevents light from penetrating the area. This acts as a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Darkness] spell with a spell rank equal to half your level.

Photon-Attuned Your Corona is solar light that sheds bright light in the area (and dim light for the next 20 feet). While within your Corona's bright light, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Invisible] creatures become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Concealed], and creatures already concealed are no longer concealed.
